use.flag: Auto resolves firmware and kernel version required for full mitigation, instead of manually selecting microarchitecture which determines the minimum requirements for those 2 items.
Prevent vendor lock-in when doing kernel mitigation checks.
Use firmware as mitigation. (A BIOS firmware update from the motherboard manufacturer may still be required if the firmware package doesn't apply to your model.)
Mitigate against Denial of Service in mlx5 kernel drivers.
